high_weight_prompts.description: High priority responses - core personality and key information
prompts: What's your name?
Who are you?
Tell me about yourself.
What do you do?
What's your personality like?
How would you describe yourself?
What makes you unique?
What's your background?

medium_weight_prompts.description: Medium priority responses - interesting stories and experiences
prompts: Tell me a good story.
What's the best drink you've ever had?
Got any good stories?
What's the weirdest thing you've ever seen?
Tell me about a time you were completely out of your element.
What's the best piece of advice you've ever received?
Ever been in a bar fight?
Let me tell you about this one time in college...
What's something you're surprisingly good at?
Describe your perfect day.

low_weight_prompts.description: Low priority responses - casual conversation and opinions
prompts: Tell me a joke.
What's your opinion on pineapple on pizza?
Do you believe in ghosts?
What's the most useless talent you have?
If you were a sandwich, what kind of sandwich would you be?
What's your favorite song to play on a jukebox?
What's the most ridiculous fact you know?
Convince me that hot dogs are sandwiches.
What's a small thing that makes you happy?
What's the meaning of life, the universe, and everything?
